      "author": "Richard Alcocer",
      "title": "I am no longer a fan",
      "review": "For some odd reason, this app no longer plays my music on or offline. I would have to reboot 4 or 5 times to listen. I will be canceling my subscription.",

    {
      "author": "Ally Rodriguez",
      "title": "Too many bugs.",
      "review": "I love this service. But every time I search an artists, the app either freezes and crashes or just crashes. I can't search for an artist and select their page to listen to what I want to listen to. It's pretty ridiculous. Needs serious patching. Now I can't use it at all. It just completely freezes every time I open the app. It's ridiculous.",

      "title": "Still bad",
      "review": "That's it , I'm outta here! (Slams door) and goes over to Google play music's house. Staying with Google play music and never going back to Rdio's house again!       "author": "Trey R",
      "title": "Second evaluation.",
      "review": "The first evaluation of the app was 5 stars. I love the way it streams. I love being able to select the artist I want to hear. I love that its commercial free. But I've had a lot of problems lately when the app crashing unexpectedly on my android s5. I have attempted to send crash reports but have had no response and apparently no fix. It would really be nice if you could fix this bug. Sorry to ding you like this guys.",

      "title": "It works some of the time",
      "review": "I often need to restart the app just to get it to play at all. Sometimes I need to restart my phone for it to start playing.
